mapper.select:
SELECT DISTINCT B.BASKET_GOODS_NO, B.BASKET_GOODS_NAME, B.BASKET_REG_DATE, B.BASKET_GOODS_AMOUNT, B.BASKET_TOPPING_NAME, G.GOODS_PRICE, G.GOODS_THUMBNAIL
FROM SG_BASKET B, SG_GOODS G, SG_MEMBER M
WHERE M.MEMBER_ID = #{MEMBER_ID} AND B.BASKET_GOODS_NAME = G.GOODS_NAME AND B.BASKET_MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO AND G.GOODS_ONOFF = 0 ORDER BY B.BASKET_REG_DATE DESC, B.BASKET_GOODS_NO ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SG_BASKET ( BASKET_NO, BASKET_MEMBER_NO, BASKET_GOODS_NO, BASKET_GOODS_NAME, BASKET_REG_DATE, BASKET_GOODS_AMOUNT, BASKET_TOPPING_NAME, BASKET_GOODS_THUMBNAIL, BASKET_GOODS_PRICE, BASKET_GOODS_KCAL ) VALUES( SG_BASKET_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{BASKET_MEMBER_NO}, #{GOODS_NO}, #{GOODS_NAME}, SYSDATE, #{BASKET_GOODS_AMOUNT}, #{GOODS_DETAIL}, #{GOODS_THUMBNAIL}, #{GOODS_PRICE}, #{GOODS_KCAL} )
mapper.delete: delete from SG_BASKET where BASKET_NO = (select MAX(BASKET_NO) from SG_BASKET where BASKET_MEMBER_NO = #{BASKET_MEMBER_NO} and BASKET_GOODS_NO = #{BASKET_GOODS_NO})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM SG_BASKET WHERE BASKET_MEMBER_NO = #{MEBMER_NO} ORDER BY BASKET_REG_DATE asc
